Menagerie:Necropotence.NAME: Necropotence
Menagerie:Necropotence.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw !M! card. NL Lose 1 HP. NL Return this card to your hand.
Menagerie:Necropotence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Lose 1 HP. NL Return this card to your hand.

Menagerie:PurgingElixir.NAME: Purging Elixir
Menagerie:PurgingElixir.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Remove all constricted, negative Strength, and negative Dexterity. NL Lose !M! HP.
